mapper.select: select *,b.om_name from clfb_contract_evaluate c left join mode_status m on m.mode_id=c.ce_id left join organization_management b on c.department=b.om_id where m.status=#{status}
mapper.update: update clfb_contract_evaluate set task_no=#{c.taskNo},prj_name=#{c.prjName},prj_person=#{c.prjPerson}, department=#{c.department},material_contract_code=#{c.materialContractCode}, contract_all_money=#{c.contractAllMoney},contract_end_money=#{c.contractEndMoney}, pay_mode=#{c.payMode},actual_charge_person=#{c.actualChargePerson}, score_product_quality_ease=#{c.scoreProductQualityEase},score_give_production_time=#{c.scoreGiveProductionTime}, score_material_report=#{c.scoreMaterialReport},score_customer_use=#{c.scoreCustomerUse}, score_pay_mode_evaluate=#{c.scorePayModeEvaluate},score_safety_civilization_environment=#{c.scoreSafetyCivilizationEnvironment}, all_score=#{c.allScore} where ce_id=#{c.ceId}
